name: Targetlaw
tag_list: free-lawyer-directory, attorney-directory, lawyer-search-engine, article-submission, legal-article-submission, free-attorney-directory, free-online-laywer-directory, free-online-attorney-directory
overview:
Targetlaw is a lawyer search engine. Unlike a typical online lawyer directory, Targetlaw gives visitors the ability to search for lawyers just as they would with any other search engine. Targetlaw only has lawyer websites, so the results are more relevant.

Targetlaw has been released as a free attorney directory. Attorneys (lawyers) can create a free profile and listing. This listing can include practice area, firm name, locations, Attorney Overview, and Summary Discription. Targetlaw is also now a legal article submission site allowing lawyers to publish articles.

milestones.description: Targetlaw is Re-released as an Attorney Directory and Legal Article Submission Site
